nodes.text: A moon orbited the planet of Otavon XII, the homeworld of the Ovoni species situated in the Otavon system of the Hollan sector at galactic coordinates M-7. Another natural satellite orbited alongside the moon and, during a clear sunset, they could be seen orbiting close to their parent planet. When the Sith Lord Darth Vader dueled an Ovoni Jedi Master named Hylon during the Great Jedi Purge, the moons hung overhead.
This moon briefly appeared in a 2010 comic book entitled Star Wars: Purge: The Hidden Blade, written by W. Haden Blackman and penciled by Chris Scalf.
